data.message: This new update is terrible. Put the messenger icon back where it used to be and get rid of the sell thing. We don't need something like that. And the way the video you're watching just gets minimized and not closed unless you pause it first is stupid. This isn't YouTube. Quit trying to change things constantly. If it ain't broke don't fix it

replies.message: Hey Julie. We’re sorry to hear that. Please share what changes you'd like to see here: http://bit.ly/2dPYjl5. -Elizabeth
